Text: Is it able to send logs using FTP as well?

oh okay. I just saw on the other torrent how to fix it.

Copy the crack into the installation directory. Then in the program click Enter License. 
fill the "Enter New License" with any numbers you want. for example: 

12345-12345-12345-12345-12345 and click Unlock and you'll have the full version.
